main.name: Shivam Gupta
main.bio: My name is Naz, I'm a Full Stack ReactJS Developer. Currently I'm working at Clever Programmer.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

experienceData.title: Software Engineer Intern
workDone: - Working with web creation pod team responsible for developing and maintaining the content for Sharechat and Moj app.
- Implemented features and services for CMS tools for different pods internal to organization.
- Following best practices like TDD and maintaining a high quality of code that rolls out to 230M users on production.
- Developed and Integrated Slackbot App for integrating comments from Figma files to slack channel for Design team.

experienceData.title: Frontend Developer Intern
workDone: - Worked on web portal project called HeadStart, where I was responsible for responsive Frontend layout of the portal using HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap4, JavaScript, also I developed basic knowledge of Vuejs.

skillsData.title: Frontend Development
skillsData.desc: Skilled in developing web apps using VueJs and ReactJs. Also acquainted with flux state management and matrial design like Vuex, Redux and Vuetify, MaterialUI respectively.

skillsData.title: Machine Learning
skillsData.desc: Familiar with exploratory data analysis, visualization of large datasets and preprocessing it, and having knowledge of various machine learning algorithms and python libraries.

aboutData: I am Shivam Gupta, pursuing final year of Bachelors of Technology in Computer Science at the Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University, New Delhi, India.

A geeky enthusiast with a passion of bringing change to the lives of people by harnessing the power of technology and engineering, I love to spend my time on trying new tools, algorithms and brushing up my logic to solve challenging problems and converting them into products that can be used by people. I also play with data structures over ball sometimes.

When not behind the screen, you can find me behind the lens, as I love to capture the world through my photography. I take an interest in chess, sports, politics, standups and would love to have a discussion about them over a cup of coffee/tea.
